title: Apportion Seats
text: apportion provides different apportionment methods allocating seats across states. methods also sometimes used allocating seats votes proportional representation systems.

title: Apportion Seats
text: can install development version apportion like :

title: Apportion Seats
text: apportion several apportionment methods, take two required arguments: - size: number seats apportion across units - pop: vector population sizes unit Implemented methods include: Adams Method (app_adams()) Balinski Young Method (app_balinski_young()) Dean Method (app_dean()) D’Hondt Method (app_dhondt()) Hamilton-Vinton Method (app_hamilton_vinton()) Huntington-Hill Method (app_huntington_hill()) Jefferson Method (app_jefferson()) Webster Method (app_webster())
